title: Fortnite's Next Season Marvel Themed? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.21.20
description:
Bless Bless and Greg Greg join forces on Games Daily today to talk about Fortnite's next season, if sandwiches should have condiments on both slices of bread, and more! 

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:08:08 - Housekeeping
DC FanDome is SATURDAY, and we’re treating it like Greg Miller’s personal E3. Greg and the Kinda Funny crew will be on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames all day long reacting to the panels for Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League, WB Montreal’s game, the Snyder cut, and every other DC movie. It all starts at 10 am PT, so don’t miss it!
We’ve partnered with Gamers Vote! https://www.gamers.vote/
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:12:00 - Marvel’s Fortnite?
00:22:00 - Delaying Avengers? - Best Friends Q:Lenny Kravic
00:28:15 - Fortnite’s Apple Event, James Batchelor @ GIB
00:39:00 - Halo TV didn’t affect Halo Infinite, Jonathan Dornbush @ IGN
00:41:45 - Fall Guys Season 2 Tease
00:44:45 - Major Iron Man VR Patch
00:47:25 - Crysis on PS4, Xbox One,  EGS
0049:50: -  DoorDash 
00:51:30 - Out today
00:55:11 - Squad Up:Graham(PSN) - Gramthelamb
00:57:00 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts: Monday: Blessing, Tim
Tuesday: Blessing, Andrea Rene
Wednesday: Tim, Whitta
Thursday: Blessing, Imran
Friday: Blessing, Imran
